name: Joker Game
description:
With this application you are capable:

• To astonish your friends that you actually have this app;
• To register all the hands;
• To distinguish word and the result - How many has been said and how many has been taken;
• To forget the once learned arithmetic - all calculations are performed automatically and with great precision;
• Become the hand of the fate and define the amount of the Khisti (a fine);
• Save couple of trees while not using the paper instead.

This application represents the tool for Joker lovers, a game that is very popular in Georgia. It will help users register the performance of all Joker players in a very comfortable format.
